name: animated-register-form
author: komalsathvik
preview: A reusable form section component with title, description, and grouped inputs

props.name: title
props.description: The title of the form section

props.name: description
props.description: Optional description text displayed under the title

props.name: children
props.description: Form fields or content to be grouped inside the section

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS classes to style the section
